About Accurate Hub Networks
Accurate Hub Networks is an Australian based company that was founded in early June 2008. Since then we have been growing rapidly, offering new products/services, and developing new ways for our clients to easily bring their website online. Our servers are all Xeon powered with a minimum of 4GB Ram. We never overcrowd or oversell our servers ensuring that you will receive reliable, high quality service.

Want to verify that we are an actual company? Visit this website and enter our business registration number: B2138599X

Contact Us
